New Records: Lionel Messi scored his 107th and 108th international goals, moving him joint-second with Iran legend Ali Daei on the list of top men's international scorers behind Cristiano Ronaldo's 130.
Key Match Events: Argentina came back from an own goal by Lisandro Martinez in the fourth minute
Lautaro Martinez scored Argentina's second goal off a penalty in the 39th minute
Messi assisted Martinez for Argentina's third goal in the 66th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina manager Lionel Scaloni hoped Messi would play the full 90 minutes against Guatemala
Scaloni didn't know when he would determine his final 26-man squad for the Copa America
Post-Match Reflections: Messi gave Lautaro Martinez the penalty shot duty, showing his gesture as a great player and gentleman on the pitch
Messi praised 19-year-old Valentin Carboni, saying he has a great future and present
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina dominated the pitch with nearly 75% of possession, particularly in the second half
The crowd was chanting 'Messi! Messi!' as Argentina was hammering its attack on Guatemala
